mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT(MERCHANT_UID, STATUS, PAY_NO, PAY_PRICE, PAY_CATEGORY, PAY_DATE, MEMO, CLIENT_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE, REG_ID, MOD_ID) VALUES (#{orderno}, '결제대기', to_char('PAYMENT')||lpad(SEQ_PAY_NO.nextval,5,0), #{amount}, '매입', sysdate, #{memo}, #{id}, sysdate, sysdate, #{e_no}, #{e_no})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.MERCHANT_UID, p.STATUS, p.PAY_NO, p.PAY_PRICE, p.PAY_CATEGORY, p.PAY_DATE, p.STATUS, p.SUCCESS_DATE,p.REFUND_DATE, p.MEMO, p.REFUDNMEMO, c.CLIENT_ID, c.CLIENT_NAME, c.CLIENT_BIRTH, c.CLIENT_TEL FROM PAYMENT p LEFT OUTER JOIN CLIENT c ON p.CLIENT_ID = c.CLIENT_ID
AND c.CLIENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND c.CLIENT_TEL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND p.PAY_CATEGORY = '매입'
AND p.PAY_CATEGORY = '환불'
ORDER BY p.PAY_DATE DESC
select CLIENT_ID, CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_BIRTH, CLIENT_TEL, CLIENT_GENDER from CLIENT
